text: avaru (nuh) helidaru; nanna janangadavare, nivu noduttillave, nanu nanna odeyana kadeyinda (torisalada) spasta sanmargadalliddene mattu avanu tanna kadeyinda nanage visesa anugrahavannu dayapalisiddane. Adannu nimage kanadante madalagide. Nimage adu (a sanmargavu) astondu asahyavagiruvaga adannu oppuvante navenu nim'mannu balatkarisabeke
